QuestData.Title: The Blessing of Samedi
QuestData.Description: Three of mah shadow huntas come here wit' me. De Warsong kill dem.$B$BWe need ta help dey souls move on. Jus' in case ya find dem first, use dis on dere bodies.$B$BIt send dere souls ta Samedi, Loa of de Grave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Fetish of Samedi on the corpses of the dead shadow hunters.
QuestData.RewardText: Dey movin' onta a betta place. Samedi be sendin' dem on all dey missions now.$B$BDank ya, $n.
